name: Resident Evil - The Mercenaries 3D
synopsis: Fight back flesh-hungry hordes in Resident Evil®: The Mercenaries 3D, an action-packed exclusive for the Nintendo 3DS. Play as your favorite characters from Resident Evil history in remixed challenges from Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil 5. Take the battle online with WiFi or local co-op and team up against the infected swarms and memorable bosses. Customize your character with a brand new Skill Slot system, and take on over 30 different missions with unique objectives and tactics. See the Resident Evil Universe like never before, with frantic Resident Evil combat in cutting-edge 3D. Online Co-op: Partner with a friend, either through the Nintendo 3DS’s WiFi or AdHoc networks. Iconic Characters: The biggest names in Zombie extermination, including Chris Redfield, Claire, Jill, Wesker, Barry, Krauser, and Hunk. Exclusive Demo: Get your first taste of Resident Evil: Revelations, the next chapter in horror.
